metadata.title: CVE-2023-46853 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Memcached before 1.6.22, an off-by-one error exists when processingproxy requests in proxy mode, if \n is used instead of \r\n.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46853` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

memcached - 1.6.14-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: memcached package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.14-1ubuntu0.1').
